section.p: This class identifies the compound or component of the drug that is associated with this allergy event.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] uniqueIngredientIdentifier with data type Code
Uniquely identifies the Ingredient. For drugs in the United States, this code should be a UNII code (Unique Ingredient Identifier), which is issued by FDA.

Contains zero or one [0..1] uniqueIngredientIdentifier with data type Code
Uniquely identifies the Ingredient. For drugs in the United States, this code should be a UNII code (Unique Ingredient Identifier), which is issued by FDA.
